'''Mythcon 33''' was the thirty-third annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference.

*'''Theme:''' "A Midsummer Night's Dream: Shakespeare and Fantasy"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' [[Alexei Kondratiev]] (myth and fantasy scholar) and Connie Willis (fantasy author)
*'''Chairman:''' Pat Yarro
